name: 8UG
description:
My idea when creating this game was to have a mechanical bug controlled by the player that  is trying to be stopped by humans because of it's destruction.  I wanted the game to have  an infinite sized environment and have some arcade type of gameplay. If I was given more time, I would spend the time adding more diversity such as different enemies, traffic lights, buildings, and so on. 

NOTE: To learn how to play the game, press the orange button on the main menu before clicking the play button.

Also I had no other idea for the game's name....
